label: 振新
本: Yoshiwara: The Glittering World of the Japanese Courtesan . University of Hawai'i Press . 1993
説明文: Furisode-shinzō 振袖新造, teenage attendants of high-ranking courtesans, so-called because of their long-sleeved (furisode) kimono. Their ages ranged from thirteen to eighteen, and they were full-fledged prostitutes.
